metadata.feature_description: Lock content to prevent concurrent editing by multiple users

steps.action: Logged in as host superuser and enabled Edit mode
steps.expected: Edit mode enabled with module actions accessible
steps.actual: Edit mode enabled successfully, module action menus accessible

steps.action: Opened Module Actions menu for Text/HTML module (366)
steps.expected: Module Actions menu should contain 'Lock Content' option
steps.actual: Module Actions menu shows: Settings, Export Content, Import Content, Help, Develop, Delete, Refresh. NO Lock Content option present.

issues: Content Locking feature is NOT implemented. Code review confirms: (1) TODO comment in EditHtml.ascx:67 says 'Disable edit tab when locked by other user' indicating planned but unimplemented feature, (2) Resource strings for 'Lock.Action', 'Unlock.Action', 'ContentLocked.Error' exist but are never used, (3) ModuleActions property in HtmlModule.ascx.cs returns empty collection, (4) No lock-related methods in HtmlTextController.cs or Services folder.

observations: Code suggests Content Locking feature was planned but never implemented. Evidence: (1) TODO comment in EditHtml.ascx line 67: 'TODO: Disable edit tab when locked by other user', (2) Localization resources exist in SharedResources.resx for 'Lock Content', 'Unlock Content', and 'ContentLocked.Error' messages, (3) These resources are never referenced by any functional code, (4) ModuleActions returns an empty collection with no Lock/Unlock actions defined.
The feature description specifies UI Location as 'Module Actions > Edit Content > Lock/Unlock' but no such menu option exists in the actual module actions menu.
